inputRows.label: Is there a health worker who has been assigned for MCN  reporting
Is there a health worker has been assigned for IDSR reporting

A separate OPD Register for above fives

subSections.title: SECTION D. MCN/IDSR DQA

inputRows.label: Does the facility have malaria cases?
Write down the total number of malaria cases obtained in the review period (N)

subSections.instruction: Instruction: Supervisor, review completeness of the following columns in the National Malaria Case Register (MCR) of the previous quarter. If there was no malaria case recorded in the quarter, click N/A :

subSections.title: D.1 Completeness of National Malaria Case Register (MCR)

inputRows.label: B. Reference number in the OPD register
C. Names of the patient (three names) (2)
F. Contact mobile number (patient or relative) (10)
Average MCR completeness filling score (average of each row %)(A+B+C+D+E+F+G) / 7

subSections.instruction: Note: Make an Average of MCR completeness filling score for all the cases obtained in the period.( Ex. A/N *100)

subSections.title: D.2 Completeness of IDSR weekly data collection booklet

inputRows.label: No. of Patients with uncomplicated Malaria given
SUB SCORE D.2 Sum of total for raw available data/days

subSections.instruction: D.3 Instruction: Verify if the following variable are filled in the IDSR booklet on  the last week of the previous quarter

subSections.title: D.4 IDSR reporting timeliness
subSections.instruction: Instruction: Download and print out the IDSR timeliness report of the last week (of the previous quarter) from the IDSR system.Tick the day on which the report was submitted (Refer to IDSR system report).

subSections.title: D.5 Verification of the reporting date of IDSR system and IDSR booklet

inputRows.label: SUB SCORE D.5 Consistence in dates of IDSR system and IDSR booklet reporting date score

subSections.instruction: Instruction: Verify if the reporting date of IDSR system and IDSR booklet match for the last week (of the previous quarter)

subSections.title: D.6 Assess the data consistence of the following collection tools for the last week of the previous quarter

inputRows.label: Malaria Laboratory Book (sum mRDT  and BS MPS) (D)
A = B = C = D = E = F?
A = B = C = D = E = F?
Consistency Check Score (sum of totals for raw 1 to 6 divide by 10)

subSections.instruction: Instruction: Download and print out the IDSR system report, MCN system report and IDSR malaria data from DHIS2 of the last week of the previous quarter and use the data to measure consistence. For Hospitals Use Laboratory booklets (Take totals of all the laboratories in the hospital). Do not fill shaded cells

subSections.title: Section D.: MCN/IDSR/IDSR DQA Score

inputRows.label: D.5 Verification of IDSR System & Booklet
SCORE: Section D. MCN/IDSR DQA Score
End time of the supervision visit

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Calculate Total Section Score by averaging  section Scores
